Requisito generado: The application will implement and apply dual access control prior to deleting users, medical records.
Justificación/Comentarios: Requisito coherente con el principio de control de acceso obligatorio antes de acciones críticas. Cumple fidelidad normativa.

Requisito generado: The application must incorporate robust access control mechanisms to prevent circumvention of access control checks by manipulating the URL. The following access control bypass tactics should be avoided and counteracted: 1. Modification of the URL (parameter manipulation or forced navigation). 2. Modification of the internal state of the application. 3. Modification of the HTML page. 4. Use of attack tools to modify API requests
Artículo/Fuente: OWASP A01:2021, CWE-639, NIST SP 800-53 AC-4, AC-6(1)
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita control de acceso roto por manipulación. Alineado con OWASP A01 y control de flujo NIST.

Requisito generado: The application must implement security measures to prevent the elevation of privileges. Prevent situations where a user can act without being authenticated or an administrator can act as a regular user after logging in.
Justificación/Comentarios: El requerimiento cubre controles para evitar escaladas de privilegios. Fidelidad clara.

Requisito generado: The application must enforce strict and flexible access controls for authorized users, preventing unauthorized access to the API and ensuring record ownership.
Justificación/Comentarios: El requisito refleja el principio de acceso mínimo y control API, normativamente sólido.

Requisito generado: The application must prevent unauthorized access to data processing devices and assign roles to users to protect the integrity of ePHI against unauthorized alterations.
Justificación/Comentarios: Alineado con HIPAA y NIST para control físico y lógico de acceso a ePHI.

Requisito generado: The system must allow users to be assigned to workgroups and grant access to records based on these groups. This access may be through a workstation, transaction, program, process, or other mechanism.
Artículo/Fuente: ISO/IEC 27002:2022 5.18, NIST SP 800-53 AC-2(7), SIREN: Control de acceso basado en roles
Justificación/Comentarios: Cubre control de acceso por grupos/roles, compatible con SIREN y NIST.

Requisito generado: The system must implement measures to control who uses the data processing system by ensuring that users are authenticated with an individual authenticator before using a group authenticator.
Justificación/Comentarios: Describe doble autenticación progresiva, alineada con controles de identificación.

Requisito generado: The system is required to establish a formal process for user registration and deregistration, facilitating access to health information systems. This process must guarantee a consistent alignment between the authentication level, the mapping of users to roles, roles to system functions, and the level of access to be granted to the user.
Justificación/Comentarios: Fuerte correspondencia con estándares para el ciclo de vida de cuentas.

Requisito generado: The system must implement a robust FIPS-validated cryptographic infrastructure to encrypt and decrypt electronically protected health information to ensure adequate protection of sensitive information.
Justificación/Comentarios: Alineado con estándares FIPS para cifrado obligatorio en ePHI.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure the security of integrity and confidentiality during the transmission of ePHI over electronic networks following the technical safeguards standards established in the regulatory framework.
Justificación/Comentarios: Correctamente refleja controles de transmisión segura para ePHI.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure secure storage of the session identifier, ensuring that at no time is the generated session ID included in requests via the URL.
Justificación/Comentarios: Prevención de exposición de identificadores de sesión mediante URL. Práctica de seguridad esencial.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure message encryption when the SessionIndex is linked to privacy data.
Justificación/Comentarios: Protección del índice de sesión vinculado a datos personales mediante cifrado. Correcta alineación.

Requisito generado: The application must exclusively store cryptographic representations of passwords, following best practices and using FIPS-validated cryptographic modules.
Justificación/Comentarios: Requisito bien redactado que exige uso de hash seguro y cumplimiento con FIPS.

Requisito generado: The application must implement data entry validation measures before storing them to guarantee the integrity and security of the information processed, stored, or accessible through end-user point devices.
Justificación/Comentarios: Buena práctica contra inyecciones. Obligatoriedad normativa y técnica clara.

Requisito generado: The application must be secure against SQL injection attacks. It is necessary to avoid possible security problems related to SQL injection and adjust the application to eliminate any risk associated with this attack.
Artículo/Fuente: OWASP A03:2021, CWE-89, NIST SP 800-53 SI-10
Justificación/Comentarios: Requisito esencial en la prevención de inyecciones SQL. Correctamente alineado.

Requisito generado: The application must implement effective restrictions on the types of files that users can upload to prevent the upload of dangerous files that may be automatically processed in the application environment.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control adecuado de cargas de archivos. Alineación clara con riesgos identificados.

Requisito generado: The application must implement protection measures against command injections. Depending on the application's architecture, the application must be modified to escape/sanitize special character input or configure the system to protect against command injection attacks.
Artículo/Fuente: OWASP A03:2021, CWE-77, NIST SP 800-53 SI-10
Justificación/Comentarios: Describe control contra comandos maliciosos. Claramente normativo.

Requisito generado: The application must implement protection measures against Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities to prevent malicious code injection attacks.
Justificación/Comentarios: XSS es una de las principales amenazas web. El requisito es válido y bien alineado.

Requisito generado: The application must implement an information output validation mechanism for the following software programs and/or applications: [reporting, data tables listing].
Justificación/Comentarios: Validación de salida esencial para prevenir fugas o XSS. Apoya trazabilidad normativa.

Requisito generado: The system must ensure that data is only processed following the directives provided in the data flow control.
Justificación/Comentarios: Describe control de tratamiento de datos conforme a flujos definidos. Correcto normativamente.

Requisito generado: The system must implement measures to prevent unauthorized and involuntary transfer of information through shared system resources.
Justificación/Comentarios: Corresponde a la protección contra canales encubiertos y fuga de información por recursos compartidos.

Requisito generado: The application must show a system of use of the system and privacy notification before granting access. This notice must contain information about the property of the system, the monitoring, recording, and auditing of use, the penalties for unauthorized use, and the acceptance of these conditions by the user.
Justificación/Comentarios: Cumple con la obligación de informar al usuario de condiciones de uso y monitoreo.

Requisito generado: The system must generate error messages that provide the user with the information necessary for corrective actions without revealing details that can be exploited.
Artículo/Fuente: OWASP A01:2021, CWE-209, NIST SP 800-53 SI-11
Justificación/Comentarios: Control esencial para evitar la fuga de información técnica crítica mediante mensajes de error.

Requisito generado: The application must physically or logically separate the functionality of the user, including user interface services and system management functionality.
Justificación/Comentarios: Segmentación de funciones es una medida fundamental de seguridad.

Requisito generado: The application should be designed not to use emerging or non-categorized mobile code.
Justificación/Comentarios: Móvil code emergente sin control puede generar riesgos importantes. Alineado con buenas prácticas.

Requisito generado: The application should not contain authentication data incorporated into its code, configuration files, scripts, HTML files, or any ASCII file.
Justificación/Comentarios: Autenticación embebida compromete la seguridad. Buen enfoque preventivo.

Requisito generado: The application should not write sensitive data in the application records. The application must be designed or reconfigured to avoid including sensitive data in the records.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita la exposición accidental de datos sensibles. Correctamente alineado con registros de auditoría.

Requisito generado: The application should not unnecessarily store or retain sensitive information in hidden fields. It is imperative to eliminate this information as soon as possible, or instead, use practices such as token or truncation, following the guidelines of PCI DSS to guarantee safe storage.
Artículo/Fuente: PCI DSS Req. 3, OWASP A01:2021, ISO/IEC 27002:2022 8.7
Justificación/Comentarios: Ocultar datos sensibles en campos HTML es una práctica insegura. Requisito correcto.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure that the configuration and control files are not stored in the same directory as the user data. The application user data must be located in a directory different from the application code, and user file permits must be established to restrict user access to application configuration.
Justificación/Comentarios: Separación de configuración y datos evita ataques por mal aislamiento. Bien definido.

Requisito generado: The application should not be housed on a general-purpose server if the application is designated as critical or high availability by the Information Security Officer (ISSO). Critical applications not shared by other less critical applications must be implemented on servers.
Justificación/Comentarios: Asegura alta disponibilidad y reduce superficies de ataque. Correctamente justificado.

Requisito generado: The application must implement an adequate limitation of access routes to prevent malicious route manipulation that can lead to unauthorized revelation of files or directories.
Justificación/Comentarios: Alineado con mitigación de Path Traversal. Buen requisito preventivo.

Requisito generado: The application must be protected against vulnerabilities of canonical representation. An adequate canonical form must be selected, and the entire user entry must be canonized before authorization decisions are made.
Justificación/Comentarios: Canonización de entradas evita saltos de validación por encoding maliciosos.

Requisito generado: The application must incorporate a 'safe failure' approach through safe error management to prevent vulnerabilities derived from incorrect management of return codes and exceptions in all system components.
Justificación/Comentarios: La gestión de fallos segura es una práctica clave de defensa en profundidad.

Requisito generado: The application should not be vulnerable to race conditions.
Justificación/Comentarios: Condiciones de carrera pueden derivar en accesos no autorizados o corrupción de datos.

Requisito generado: The application must implement measures to prevent memory use after being released since referring to memory after release can cause program failures, the use of unexpected values, or execute unwanted code.
Justificación/Comentarios: Uso después de liberar memoria es una causa común de errores de seguridad graves.

Requisito generado: The application should prevent null pointer reference, avoiding trying to access a null pointer, which could result in unexpected failure or exit.
Justificación/Comentarios: Buena práctica para asegurar la robustez del sistema ante accesos inválidos.

Requisito generado: The application must implement controls defined by the organization to protect the system's memory against unauthorized code execution.
Justificación/Comentarios: Cumple requisitos de integridad del espacio de memoria y control de ejecución.

Requisito generado: The application should not be vulnerable to buffer overflow attacks.
Justificación/Comentarios: Las sobrecargas de búfer son vectores clásicos de explotación. Requisito sólido.

Requisito generado: The application should be designed to use components that are not vulnerable to XML attacks.
Artículo/Fuente: OWASP XML External Entity (XXE), CWE-611, ISO/IEC 27002:2022 8.30
Justificación/Comentarios: Mitigación contra ataques XXE está bien cubierta. Buen criterio de diseño seguro.

Requisito generado: The application must implement repetition-resistant authentication mechanisms for network access for privileged and non-privileged accounts.
Justificación/Comentarios: Prevención contra ataques de repetición. Enlace claro con mecanismos robustos de autenticación.

Requisito generado: Applications with SOAP messages requiring integrity must include the following message elements: -Message ID -Service Request -Timestamp -SAML Assertion (optionally included in messages), and all elements of the message must be digitally signed.
Justificación/Comentarios: Elementos críticos para asegurar integridad y autenticidad en mensajes SOAP. Alineado con WS-Security.

Requisito generado: The application must authenticate all the endpoint devices connected to the network before establishing any connection.
Justificación/Comentarios: Prevención contra conexiones no autorizadas. Buen enfoque de seguridad de red.

Requisito generado: Safe messages with WS-Security must have time stamps indicating when they were created and expired. The application must be designed to use these time stamps and sequence numbers in WS-Security messages.
Justificación/Comentarios: Uso de time-based tokens y control de secuencia es recomendado en entornos seguros SOAP.

Requisito generado: The application must verify the validity periods in all messages that WS-SECURITY or SAML statements use. Design and configure the application to use and verify validity periods in all token WS-Security profiles and SAML statements.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control de expiración de tokens es obligatorio para proteger contra reusos indebidos.

Requisito generado: The application must define, document, and implement configurations, including security, hardware, software, services, and networks, adjusting them in the most restrictive way consistent with operational requirements.
Justificación/Comentarios: Configuración segura mínima necesaria reduce vectores de ataque.

Requisito generado: The application must define and implement due security settings to avoid DDoS attacks.
Justificación/Comentarios: Medidas antiflujo masivo protegen disponibilidad, alineado con controles SC-5.

Requisito generado: The application must implement measures to validate the deserialization of non-reliable data and ensure the resulting data are valid before processing them.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control vital ante ataques de deserialización insegura. Requisito válido y justificado.

Requisito generado: The application must be protected against Vulnerabilities of CROSS-SITE REQUEST FORGERY (CSRF) through the configuration to use unpredictable challenge tokens and verify the HTTP referrer, ensuring that the application was issued from the site itself. In addition, mitigating controls must be implemented as necessary, such as using web reputation services.
Justificación/Comentarios: Contramedidas múltiples contra CSRF reflejan enfoque integral y normativo.

Requisito generado: The application must be configured to deactivate non-essential capabilities.
Justificación/Comentarios: Deshabilitar funciones innecesarias reduce superficie de ataque.

Requisito generado: The application should avoid showing users what is not required to users. It is necessary to configure it so that it does not reveal technical details about architecture in error events.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control de exposición en errores evita fuga de información interna.

Requisito generado: The application must identify and authenticate uniquely non-organizational users (or processes that act in the name of non-organizational users).
Justificación/Comentarios: Identificación y autenticación individualizada es clave para usuarios externos.

Requisito generado: The application must identify and authenticate uniquely organizational users (or processes that act in the name of organizational users).
Justificación/Comentarios: Establecimiento de identidades únicas organizacionales es obligatorio en sistemas seguros.

Requisito generado: The applications that issue SAML statements must use random numbers approved by FIPS to generate SAML session in Saml's AuthnStatement element.
Justificación/Comentarios: Uso de RNG seguros es requerido para asegurar unicidad y resistencia criptográfica.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure that each party that makes statements (Asserting Party) provides unique identifiers for each SAML statement (Security Assertion Markup Language). It is required to design and configure each SAML statement authority to use unique affirmation identifiers.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita colisiones o repetición de afirmaciones. Práctica estandarizada.

Requisito generado: The application must guarantee the use of encrypted statements or equivalent confidentiality protections when the statement data is transmitted through an intermediary, and the confidentiality of the statements of statements is necessary during the transmission through the intermediary.
Justificación/Comentarios: Protección de contenido de SAML durante tránsito. Requisito alineado con buenas prácticas.

Requisito generado: The application should use both the <NotBefore> y <NotOnOrAfter> elements and the <OneTimeUse> element when using the <Conditions> element in a SAML Assertion.
Justificación/Comentarios: Uso combinado limita reutilización indebida de afirmaciones.

Requisito generado: The application should use the NotOnOrAfter condition when using the SubjectConfirmation element in a SAML assertion.
Justificación/Comentarios: Ayuda a restringir validez del canal de comunicación entre partes.

Requisito generado: The application must configure session cookies with the following properties: o Establish the HTTPOnly flag in session cookies. o Ensure that the safe flag (Secure) is activated in session cookies.
Justificación/Comentarios: Previene ataques de robo de cookies y MITM.

Requisito generado: Keep updated on the components or libraries of the application.
Justificación/Comentarios: Gestión de versiones asegura integridad y seguridad del software.

Requisito generado: The libraries or software components that do not have the support or maintenance must be removed or replaced.
Justificación/Comentarios: Bibliotecas sin soporte presentan vulnerabilidades. Buena práctica de mantenimiento seguro.

Requisito generado: The application must provide notifications or alerts when product updates and safety-related patches are available.
Justificación/Comentarios: Actualizaciones críticas requieren alertas para mitigar vulnerabilidades.

Requisito generado: The application must identify user actions that can be carried out in the system without requiring identification or authentication.
Justificación/Comentarios: Identifica riesgos asociados a funcionalidades públicas o pre-autenticadas.

Requisito generado: All organizations that connect to the Health Electronic Registry Information System (EHRI) must submit to possible users of Systems Point of Sale (POS) that link to EHRI to a formal process of registration of Users.
Justificación/Comentarios: Proceso de registro estructurado asegura trazabilidad y acceso autorizado.

Requisito generado: The application, when using PKI-based authentication, must validate certificates by building a certification chain (including state information) to an accepted trust anchor, so the application must be designed to create a certification chain to a Trust Anchor accepted when using PKI-based authentication.
Justificación/Comentarios: Verificación de confianza mediante cadena de certificación es esencial en PKI.

Requisito generado: The application, when using authentication based on public key infrastructure (PKI), must enforce authorized access to the corresponding private key, so the application or relevant access control mechanism must be configured to guarantee authorized access to the private key(s) of the application.
Justificación/Comentarios: Protección de claves privadas crítica en autenticación de clave pública.

Requisito generado: The application must implement procedures to verify that the person or entity that seeks access to protected electronic health information is what it claims to be.
Justificación/Comentarios: Obligación de validación de identidad en protección de datos de salud.

Requisito generado: The application must impose a limit of 3 invalid login attempts by a user during 15 minutes and automatically block the account for 1 hour; block the account or node until an administrator releases it; delay the next login notice for 1 hour; notify the system administrator; take permanent account blocking when the maximum number of failed attempts is exceeded.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control de intentos fallidos reduce vectores de fuerza bruta.

Requisito generado: The application must implement procedures to verify that the person or entity that seeks access to protected electronic health information is what it claims to be.
Justificación/Comentarios: Requisito duplicado de IAF-005. Se sugiere consolidar.

Requisito generado: The application must implement robust multifactor authentication, using at least two authentication factors (for example, CAC, Alt. Token) to access non-privileged networks and accounts.
Justificación/Comentarios: Requisito robusto de autenticación, especialmente para cuentas no privilegiadas.

Requisito generado: The application should allow users to use a single identity credential (unique login), whether patients or suppliers, when the portal provides access to other applications or services with separate authentication mechanisms.
Justificación/Comentarios: Uso de identidad única mejora experiencia y control de acceso coherente.

Requisito generado: The application must consider and select robust levels of identity assurance following the roles of the users, defining the necessary mechanisms to prove the identity of the record initially.
Justificación/Comentarios: Requiere alineación del nivel de garantía de identidad con la sensibilidad del acceso.

Requisito generado: The application must consider and select robust levels of identity assurance following the roles of the users, defining the necessary mechanisms to prove the identity of the record initially.
Justificación/Comentarios: Contenido redundante respecto a IAF-010. Debe consolidarse para evitar duplicidades.

Requisito generado: The application must implement safe login procedures that protect against login attempts by brute force.
Justificación/Comentarios: Mitiga ataques de fuerza bruta. Alineado con buenas prácticas de autenticación.

Requisito generado: The application should consider that by authenticating the user, at least the two factors of the authentication mechanism are implemented.
Justificación/Comentarios: Refuerza el enfoque en autenticación multifactor. Correctamente definido.

Requisito generado: The application must require the re-authentication of users and devices when information systems' authenticators, roles, or security categories change.
Justificación/Comentarios: Previene escalamiento indebido de privilegios tras cambios críticos.

Requisito generado: In case of an error during the login, the application should not offer specific help messages that can benefit an unauthorized user.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita el reconocimiento de usuarios válidos. Buen criterio de seguridad.

Requisito generado: The application should not show system or application identifiers until the login process has been successfully completed.
Justificación/Comentarios: Limita exposición temprana de información técnica al atacante.

Requisito generado: The application should not allow passwords to be transmitted in clear text on a network, following section 9.4.2 J) of safe login procedures.
Justificación/Comentarios: Protección esencial contra sniffing y MITM.

Requisito generado: During the login procedures, the application should not show the password that is being entered.
Justificación/Comentarios: Buena práctica de interfaz para protección visual de credenciales.

Requisito generado: The application must prohibit password reuse for a minimum of five generations.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control común para mejorar la higiene de contraseñas.

Requisito generado: The application should allow the use of a temporary password for the session in the system, with an immediate change to a permanent password.
Justificación/Comentarios: Contraseña temporal forzada a cambio inmediato reduce riesgo de divulgación inicial.

Requisito generado: The application must, when a successful login is completed, show the following information: 1. Date and time of the last successful login. 2. Details of any login and login attempts since the last successful session.
Justificación/Comentarios: Información de auditoría útil para detección de accesos no autorizados.

Requisito generado: The application must apply a minimum 24-hour/1 day password life policy.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita cambios frecuentes de contraseñas para eludir restricciones de historia.

Requisito generado: The application must apply a maximum 60-day password restriction.
Artículo/Fuente: NIST SP 800-63B (aunque se desaconseja cambios periódicos forzados), ISO/IEC 27002:2022 8.2
Justificación/Comentarios: Aunque hoy se desaconseja en algunos marcos, aún es práctica en muchos entornos regulados.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure that changing the password requires changing at least eight characters.
Justificación/Comentarios: No está explícito en la normativa que se requieran 8 cambios exactos. Conviene reformular.

Requisito generado: The application must comply with the following password complexity policies: o Require at least a special character. o Apply a minimal password length of 15 characters. o Demand at least one capital character. o Make at least a lowercase character. o Impose password complexity by requiring at least a numerical character.
Justificación/Comentarios: Complejidad fuerte, aunque NIST recomienda más bien frases largas que complejidad arbitraria.

Requisito generado: The application must prevent users, except the administrator or the user associated with the password, from making password changes.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita cambios indebidos de credenciales. Práctica esencial de control.

Requisito generado: Do not send or implement predetermined credentials, especially for administrators.
Justificación/Comentarios: Credenciales predeterminadas son vector común de ataque inicial.

Requisito generado: The application must limit the number of concurrent sessions for each account to three.
Justificación/Comentarios: Limita exposición y compartición indebida de cuentas.

Requisito generado: The application must limit the number of concurrent sessions for each account to three.
Justificación/Comentarios: Redundante con IAF-028. Consolidar en una sola especificación.

Requisito generado: The EHRI application must restrict the duration of connections to application services to provide additional security in access to those applications.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control de duración de sesión evita sesiones innecesariamente prolongadas y riesgos asociados.

Requisito generado: The application must implement electronic procedures that automatically finish an electronic session after a default inactivity period.
Justificación/Comentarios: Inactividad prolongada debe conllevar cierre automático por seguridad.

Requisito generado: The application must automatically end the administrator user session and close the administrator’s session after a 10-minute inactivity period is exceeded.
Justificación/Comentarios: Sesiones privilegiadas requieren políticas más estrictas de inactividad.

Requisito generado: The application must automatically end the un-privileged user session and close the session of not-privileged users after a 15-minute inactivity period has elapsed.
Justificación/Comentarios: Periodo estándar para sesiones de usuario regular.

Requisito generado: The application must automatically end the un-privileged user session and close the session of not-privileged users after a 15-minute inactivity period has elapsed.
Justificación/Comentarios: Repetido respecto a IAF-033. Consolidar.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure that, at the end of a session, all network connections linked to that session are closed, and the session ID and cookies data are destroyed.
Justificación/Comentarios: Finalización segura de sesión es esencial para proteger datos persistentes.

Requisito generado: The application must be able to revoke the user's access privileges on time, which implies immediately preventing the user from accessing the system once their privileges have been revoked.
Justificación/Comentarios: Revocación inmediata es crítica tras desvinculación o compromisos.

Requisito generado: The application must finish the existing user sessions by eliminating an account. Configure the application to close user sessions whose accounts have been deleted.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita que sesiones activas queden huérfanas tras eliminación.

Requisito generado: The application must automatically delete or deactivate temporary user accounts 72 hours after creation. Configure the temporary accounts so they are deleted or deactivated automatically after 72 hours of the account's creation.
Justificación/Comentarios: Gestión de cuentas temporales reduce exposición innecesaria.

Requisito generado: The application must automatically deactivate the user accounts after an inactivity period of 35 days.
Justificación/Comentarios: Recomendado para gestión segura de cuentas inactivas.

Requisito generado: The application must acquire components only from official sources through safe links. Preference must be given to signed packages to reduce the possibility of including a modified or malicious component.
Justificación/Comentarios: Reduce riesgo de inclusión de software malicioso desde fuentes no confiables.

Requisito generado: The application must incorporate a 'software supply chain safety tool' to verify that the components do not contain known vulnerabilities.
Justificación/Comentarios: Automatiza la verificación continua del estado de seguridad de dependencias.

Requisito generado: The application must have a process for reviewing code and configuration changes to minimize the possibility of malicious code or configuration introduction in the software pipeline.
Justificación/Comentarios: Previene introducción inadvertida o maliciosa en fases CI/CD.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure that its continuous integration channel/continuous deployment (CI/CD) has adequate segregation, safe configuration, and access control to guarantee the integrity of the code that flows through construction and implementation processes.
Justificación/Comentarios: Asegura la integridad del entorno de desarrollo y despliegue.

Requisito generado: The application must guarantee that the non-signed or non-encrypted serialized data are not sent to non-reliable customers without integrity verification or digital signature to detect manipulations or reproductions of the serialized data.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita la manipulación o reproducción maliciosa de datos serializados.

Requisito generado: The application must be able to show the previous content of a record at any point in the past, as well as the associated details of who entered, agreed, or modified the data and at what time.
Justificación/Comentarios: Apoya trazabilidad e integridad mediante registros detallados de auditoría.

Requisito generado: The application must implement policies and procedures to protect protected electronic health information (EPHI) against improper alterations or destruction.
Justificación/Comentarios: Esencial para mantener la integridad y trazabilidad de ePHI.

Requisito generado: The application must implement a comprehensive security management process to guarantee the non-repudiation, confidentiality, integrity, and availability of all protected electronic health information (EPHI) created, received, maintained, or transmitted. This process must include the periodic review of system activity records, such as audit records, access reports, and security monitoring reports.
Justificación/Comentarios: Gestión integral conforme a los requisitos de salvaguarda administrativa de HIPAA.

Requisito generado: The application must implement a comprehensive security management process to guarantee the non-repudiation, confidentiality, integrity, and availability of all protected electronic health information (EPHI) created, received, maintained, or transmitted. This process must include the periodic review of system activity records, such as audit records, access reports, and security monitoring reports.
Justificación/Comentarios: Duplicado exacto de LMF-001. Se recomienda consolidar.

Requisito generado: The application must have an audit reduction capacity that supports research after security incidents. The application must be configured to offer an audit reduction capacity that supports forensic investigations.
Justificación/Comentarios: Facilita análisis forense eficaz post incidente.

Requisito generado: The application must generate audit records when successful/unsuccessful attempts are made to grant privileges. Configure the application to audit successful and unsuccessful attempts to grant privileges.
Justificación/Comentarios: Auditoría esencial para trazabilidad de cambios de privilegios.

Requisito generado: The application must generate audit records for successful and unsuccessful attempts to modify privileges, security levels, and information categories.
Justificación/Comentarios: Permite seguimiento de cambios críticos en seguridad y acceso.

Requisito generado: The application must generate audit records for successful and failed attempts to eliminate privileges, security levels, database safety objects, and information categories.
Justificación/Comentarios: Eliminación de objetos sensibles debe ser registrada rigurosamente.

Requisito generado: The application must generate audit records for privileged activities, accesses at the system level, successful/non-success to objects, and all direct access to the information system. The application in registration tickets corresponding to each type of activity mentioned must be configured.
Justificación/Comentarios: Incluye actividades privilegiadas y acceso directo al sistema.

Requisito generado: The application must register the actions of users related to access and data changes. It includes identifying specific data elements that require protection and auditing all access and modification of data.
Justificación/Comentarios: Auditoría centrada en ePHI, soporta cumplimiento HIPAA.

Requisito generado: The application must audit the execution of privileged functions. Configure the application to record registration inputs when privileged functions are executed. At least ensure the specific action performed on the date and time of the event is registered.
Justificación/Comentarios: Funciones privilegiadas deben quedar registradas para análisis.

Requisito generado: The application must generate safe audit records every time a user: 1. Access, create, or update the personal health information (PHI) of a patient/person through the application; 2. Cancels the consent directives of a patient/person through the application; 3. Access, through the application, to data blocked or masked by instruction of a patient/person; 4. Access, create, or update user registration data in the application.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control detallado de eventos críticos sobre ePHI.

Requisito generado: The application must generate audit records that show the start and end of the user's access time to the system and events related to the beginning, closure, and duration of sessions.
Justificación/Comentarios: Permite reconstruir la cronología del uso del sistema.

Requisito generado: The application must initiate the audit of sessions at the beginning. Configure the application to start registering application events as soon as the application starts.
Justificación/Comentarios: Crítico para que no se pierdan eventos de inicio.

Requisito generado: The application must register closing events of the application. Configure the application or application server to record the closing events of the application in the event records.
Justificación/Comentarios: Cierre controlado garantiza fin correcto del seguimiento de sesión.

Requisito generado: The application must generate audit records when successful or failed login attempts occur.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control básico para detección de accesos indebidos.

Requisito generado: The application must ensure that audit records contain information that establishes the following: 1. When using centralized logging; the application must include a unique identifier in order to distinguish itself from other application logs. 2. What type of event occurred; 3. The function performed by the accessing user; 4. When the event occurred with a time stamp mark that meets a granularity of one second for a minimum degree of precision. 5. Where the event occurred; 6. The organization of the accessing user (at least in those cases where an individual accesses information on behalf of more than one organization); 7. Source of the event that establishes the identity of any individual or process associated with the event; 8. Network addresses and protocols; 9. Destination IP addresses; 10. Device identity or location, if possible, and system identifier; 11. The outcome of the event; 12. Identity of any individuals, subjects, or objects/entities associated with the event using the username or user ID of the user related to the event; 13. The role the user is exercising; 14. In the case of access override to blocked or masked records or portions of records, a reason for the override, as chosen by the user making the access; 15. In the case of changes to consent directives made by a substitute decision-maker, the identity of the decision-maker.
Justificación/Comentarios: Detallado y en línea con buenas prácticas de trazabilidad.

Requisito generado: The application must back up the audit records at least every seven days in a system or component different from the one being audited.
Justificación/Comentarios: Protección de registros frente a corrupción o pérdida local.

Requisito generado: The application must maintain audit records for a specific period of time, determined by regulations and medical standards. This retention must cover from 7 to 75 years, depending on the information and legal requirements of the State. Some states may require that medical records be preserved in the hospital to guarantee continuous accessibility.
Justificación/Comentarios: Cobertura del ciclo de vida completo de registros clínicos.

Requisito generado: The LOG management application must ensure access and protect against unauthorized modification delete, and guarantee the integrity of audit tools to prevent improper use or commitment.
Justificación/Comentarios: La protección de los mecanismos de auditoría es esencial.

Requisito generado: The application must implement strict control measures for the elimination, replication, and consultations of audit records, ensuring total control over the entry, reading, manipulation, or data disposal.
Justificación/Comentarios: Minimiza riesgo de manipulación o eliminación maliciosa.

Requisito generado: The application must transfer audit records to a system or medium different from the audited system and be configured to write application records in a centralized repository.
Justificación/Comentarios: Consolidación centralizada facilita análisis y preservación.

Requisito generado: The application must allow the review and centralized analysis of audit records with filtering options defined by the organization.
Justificación/Comentarios: Permite eficiencia en auditorías e investigaciones.

Requisito generado: At least one application administrator must be registered to receive notifications of updates or safety alerts when they are automatically available. Administrators must register to receive update notifications, allowing them to stop and update applications and components of the application.
Justificación/Comentarios: Garantiza respuesta rápida ante vulnerabilidades emergentes.

Requisito generado: The application must generate audit records when a concurrent session is produced from different workstations.
Justificación/Comentarios: Detección temprana de comportamiento sospechoso o uso compartido de cuentas.

Requisito generado: EHRI must be able to register and safely report each access to the records of a patient/person, complying with the following requirements: 1. Identify all users who have accessed or modified the records of a patient/person in a given period. 2. Provide functionality to inform for a given user: • The records you can access. • You can access the specific sections of the registration(s). • The privileges you have concerning each of these records. 3. Identify all patients/people whose records have been accessed or modified by a specific user in a given period. 4. The system must generate a security event in case of an attempt or potential success for violating the login controls.
Justificación/Comentarios: Permite trazabilidad completa de accesos a ePHI por usuario y paciente.

Requisito generado: The application must notify the administrator, audit, and record the modifications made in the application configuration.
Justificación/Comentarios: Configurar trazabilidad de cambios para evitar alteraciones no autorizadas.

Requisito generado: The application must notify the system administrators and system security officers (ISSO) of account activation actions. The application must be configured to send notifications to the system administrator and the ISSO when application accounts are enabled.
Justificación/Comentarios: Transparencia en acciones críticas de gestión de cuentas.

Requisito generado: The application must notify the system administrators and system security officers (ISSO) of account deactivation actions. The application must be configured to send notifications to the system administrator and the ISSO when application accounts are enabled.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita desactivaciones no autorizadas sin supervisión.

Requisito generado: The application must notify the system administrators and the system security officers (ISSO) when application accounts are created.
Justificación/Comentarios: Control estricto de creación de nuevas cuentas de usuario.

Requisito generado: The application must notify the system administrators and system information security officers (ISSO) of account elimination actions. The application configuration must include notification to the system administrator and the ISSO when application accounts are deleted.
Justificación/Comentarios: Evita eliminación silenciosa de cuentas que afecten trazabilidad.

Requisito generado: The application must notify system administrators and system security officers (ISSO) when user accounts are modified.
Justificación/Comentarios: Mantiene trazabilidad de cambios sobre privilegios o atributos de cuentas.

Requisito generado: The application must provide functions to analyze records and audit traces to identify all users who have accessed or modified patient/people records during a certain period.
Justificación/Comentarios: Permite investigaciones retrospectivas efectivas.

Requisito generado: The application must alert the Information Security Officer (ISSO) and the System administration (SA) in case of a failure in audit processing. The application must be configured to send an alarm when the audit system fails or is experiencing failure.
Justificación/Comentarios: Fallas en auditoría deben ser notificadas inmediatamente.

Requisito generado: The application must implement protection measures to prevent SSRF vulnerabilities, including network and application layer controls.
Justificación/Comentarios: Previene explotación de servicios internos por SSRF.
